battle
Basic explanation of words
battle
zh√†ng
Weapon: honor guard. Fire fighting.
Holding a weapon: a sword.
War: fighting. Victory.
Rely on, rely on: rely on. Rely on. Reliance. Speak righteously (speak fair for justice).
battle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[‚ë†]Ôºªzh√†ngÔºΩ
["Guangyun" cut in two straight, raised on top, and clear. ]
["Guangyun" cuts straight and brightly, to swell, to clear. ]
(1) The general term for weapons such as bows, spears, swords, and halberds.
(2) Guard of honor; defending troops.
(3) Battle; war.
(4) Rely on, rely on.
(5) Hold, hold.
